question: Question_02_(a)
statement:
Suppose z = f(x,y) has continuous second order partial derivatives and x
= r cos(t), y = r sin(t). Express the following partial derivatives in
terms of r,t and the partial derivatives of f.

 a)

\begin{align*}\frac{\partial z}{\partial t}\end{align*}
hints: To evaluate this partial derivative we need to use the chain rule.
